overview:
I provide a comprehensive range of financial advisory services to clients, seeking to complete transactions in the arenas of Corporate Finance and Project Finance. The following are services provided.

Structuring Syndication Financial Modelling

Private Equity / Venture Capital Mergers and Acquisitions Strategic Alliances / Joint Ventures Mezzanine Capital Capital Restructuring

Specialties: Excellent network of relationships with the Financial community, both in India and overseas. Has advised leading organizations across a wide range of sectors including Telecom, Power, Media, Roads, Pharmaceuticals, Biotech, Information Technology, Ports, Internet, Broadband, Cement, Steel and Logistics. Has worked on mandates from Fortune 500 companies.
